sections.title: Mobile Transfer
sections.message: Do you have dozens of voice memos in your phone with riff ideas? Duh, who doesn't. The new mobile transfer feature allows you to send them directly from your phone to your SongRiffer library in like two clicks. Maybe three. Download the new version and try it right now.

sections.title: A bunch of other stuff
sections.message: Stats, archives, basic support for videos... There's a lot of bug fixes and improvements included, and a lot of stuff coming in the future!
